reports.title: Guide
reports.query:
#### This report support browsing Syntax Template related data from the StudyBuilder repository database

This report contains the following tabs:
 - **Select Template Parameter Value** tab enable browsing and selection of template paramaters and their values.
 - **Parent Templates** tab list all Parent Templates.
 
   Note this include user defined templates, and list is filtered based on Template Parameter selection on first tab.
 - **Pre-instance Templates** tab list all Pre-instantiations of Parent Templates.
 
   These are to support study search and selections, but will newer be related to a study.
 - **Template Instantiations** tab list all instantiations in latest version.
 - **Study Usage** tab list instantiations with reference to study usage.

reports.title: Template Parameters
reports.query:
MATCH (p:TemplateParameter)-->(r:TemplateParameterTermRoot)-[:LATEST]->(t:TemplateParameterTermValue)
WHERE ( p.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or
        $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      ( t.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or
       $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null )
RETURN DISTINCT p.name as TemplateParameter
ORDER BY p.name

reports.title: Select Template Parameter
reports.query:
MATCH (n:TemplateParameter)-->(r:TemplateParameterTermRoot)-[:LATEST]->(t:TemplateParameterTermValue) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 40

reports.title: Template Parameter Values
reports.query:
MATCH (p:TemplateParameter)-->(r:TemplateParameterTermRoot)-[:LATEST]->(t:TemplateParameterTermValue)
WHERE (p.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or
       $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      ( t.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or
       $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null )
RETURN DISTINCT t.name as Name, t.name_sentence_case as SentenceCaseName
ORDER BY t.name

reports.title: Select Parameter Value
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`TemplateParameterTermValue`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 25

reports.title: Parent Syntax Templates using selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
MATCH (l:Library)-->(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot)-[:LATEST]->(stv:SyntaxTemplateValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH(str)<-[:CREATED_FROM]-(spir:SyntaxPreInstanceRoot)-[:LATEST]->(spiv:SyntaxPreInstanceValue)-[:USES_VALUE]->(tptv:TemplateParameterTermValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:USES_PARAMETER]->(tp:TemplateParameter)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(cttr:CTTermRoot)-->(ctar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(ctav:CTTermAttributesValue)
WITH l, str, stv, ctav, tp
WHERE (tp.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      (tptv.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null)

RETURN l.name as Library,
       str.sequence_id as `Seq Num`,
       CASE
         WHEN 'ObjectiveTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ObjectiveTemplate'
         WHEN 'EndpointTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'EndpointTemplate'
         WHEN 'TimeframeTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'TimeframeTemplate'
         WHEN 'CriteriaTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'CriteriaTemplate'
         WHEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplate'
         WHEN 'FootnoteTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'FootnoteTemplate'
       ELSE 'ups'
       END as Type,
       ctav.preferred_term as SubType,
       //stv.name as FormmatedText,
       stv.name_plain as Template,
       apoc.text.join(COLLECT(tp.name), ', ') as TemplateParameter,
       str.uid
ORDER BY str.uid

reports.title: Selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
Return CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparameter_name END as `Selected Parameters`,
CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name END as `Selected Values`

reports.title: Pre-instance Syntax Templates using selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
MATCH (stv:SyntaxTemplateValue)<-[:LATEST]-(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot)<-[:CREATED_FROM]-(spir:SyntaxPreInstanceRoot)-[:LATEST]->(spiv:SyntaxPreInstanceValue),
(l:Library)-->(spir)
OPTIONAL MATCH (spiv)-[:USES_VALUE]->(tptv:TemplateParameterTermValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:USES_PARAMETER]->(tp:TemplateParameter)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(cttr:CTTermRoot)-->(ctar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(ctav:CTTermAttributesValue)
WITH l, str, stv, spir, spiv, tptv, tp, ctav
WHERE (tp.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      (tptv.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null)

RETURN l.name as Library,
       spir.sequence_id as PreinstanceSequenceNumber,
       CASE
         WHEN 'ObjectiveTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ObjectiveTemplate'
         WHEN 'EndpointTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'EndpointTemplate'
         WHEN 'TimeframeTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'TimeframeTemplate'
         WHEN 'CriteriaTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'CriteriaTemplate'
         WHEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplate'
         WHEN 'FootnoteTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'FootnoteTemplate'
       ELSE 'ups'
       END as Type,
       ctav.preferred_term as SubType,
       //stv.name as ParentFormmatedText,
       stv.name_plain as ParentTemplate,
       COLLECT(tp.name) as TemplateParameter,
       //spiv.name as PreFormattedText,
       spiv.name_plain as InstanceTemplate,
       COLLECT(tptv.name) as ParameterValues
ORDER BY  spir.sequence_id

reports.title: Selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
Return CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparameter_name END as `Selected Parameters`,
CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name END as `Selected Values`

reports.title: All Templates using selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
CALL {
MATCH (l:Library)-->(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot)-[:LATEST]->(stv:SyntaxTemplateValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:USES_PARAMETER]->(tp:TemplateParameter)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(cttr:CTTermRoot)-->(ctar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(ctav:CTTermAttributesValue)
WITH l, str, stv, ctav, tp
WHERE tp.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null 
RETURN l.name as Library,
       str.sequence_id as SequenceNumber,
       CASE
         WHEN 'ObjectiveTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ObjectiveTemplate'
         WHEN 'EndpointTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'EndpointTemplate'
         WHEN 'TimeframeTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'TimeframeTemplate'
         WHEN 'CriteriaTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'CriteriaTemplate'
         WHEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplate'
         WHEN 'FootnoteTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'FootnoteTemplate'
       ELSE 'ups'
       END as Type,
       ctav.preferred_term as SubType,
       stv.name_plain as Template,
       apoc.text.join(COLLECT(tp.name), ', ') as TemplateParameter,
       '' as ParameterValues,
       'Syntax Template' as TemplateType
UNION
MATCH (stv:SyntaxTemplateValue)<-[:LATEST]-(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot)<-[:CREATED_FROM]-(spir:SyntaxPreInstanceRoot)-[:LATEST]->(spiv:SyntaxPreInstanceValue),
(l:Library)-->(spir)
OPTIONAL MATCH (spiv)-[:USES_VALUE]->(tptv:TemplateParameterTermValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:USES_PARAMETER]->(tp:TemplateParameter)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(cttr:CTTermRoot)-->(ctar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(ctav:CTTermAttributesValue)
WITH l, str, stv, spir, spiv, tptv, tp, ctav
WHERE (tp.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      (tptv.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null)
RETURN l.name as Library,
       spir.sequence_id as SequenceNumber,
       CASE
         WHEN 'ObjectiveTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ObjectiveTemplate'
         WHEN 'EndpointTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'EndpointTemplate'
         WHEN 'TimeframeTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'TimeframeTemplate'
         WHEN 'CriteriaTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'CriteriaTemplate'
         WHEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplate'
         WHEN 'FootnoteTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'FootnoteTemplate'
       ELSE 'ups'
       END as Type,
       ctav.preferred_term as SubType,
       spiv.name_plain  as Template,
       apoc.text.join(COLLECT(tp.name), ', ') as TemplateParameter,
       apoc.text.join(COLLECT(tptv.name), ', ') as ParameterValues,
       'Pre-instance Template' as TemplateType
}
RETURN Library,
       SequenceNumber,
       Type,
       SubType,
       Template,
       TemplateParameter,
       ParameterValues,
       TemplateType
ORDER BY SequenceNumber

reports.title: Selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
Return CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparameter_name END as `Selected Parameters`,
CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name END as `Selected Values`

reports.title: Template Instantiations using selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
MATCH (l:Library)-->(sir:SyntaxInstanceRoot)-[:LATEST]->(siv:SyntaxInstanceValue),(sir)<--(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot)-[:LATEST]->(stv:SyntaxTemplateValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (siv)-[:USES_VALUE]->(tptr:TemplateParameterTermRoot)-[:LATEST]->(tptv:TemplateParameterTermValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:USES_PARAMETER]->(tp:TemplateParameter)
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(cttr:CTTermRoot)-->(ctar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(ctav:CTTermAttributesValue)
WITH l, sir, siv, str, stv, tptv, tp, ctav
WHERE (tp.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      (tptv.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null)
RETURN l.name as Library,
       str.sequence_id as SequenceNumber,
       CASE
         WHEN 'ObjectiveTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ObjectiveTemplate'
         WHEN 'EndpointTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'EndpointTemplate'
         WHEN 'TimeframeTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'TimeframeTemplate'
         WHEN 'CriteriaTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'CriteriaTemplate'
         WHEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'ActivityInstructionTemplate'
         WHEN 'FootnoteTemplateValue' in labels(stv)  THEN 'FootnoteTemplate'
       ELSE 'ups'
       END as Type,
       ctav.preferred_term as SubType,
       //siv.name as FormmatedText,
       siv.name_plain as InstanceTemplate,
       stv.name_plain as ParentTemplate,
       apoc.text.join(COLLECT(tp.name), ', ') as TemplateParameter,
       apoc.text.join(COLLECT(tptv.name), ', ') as ParameterValues
ORDER BY str.sequence_id, siv.name_plain

reports.title: Selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
Return CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparameter_name END as `Selected Parameters`,
CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name END as `Selected Values`

reports.title: Template Instantiations by Study Usage
reports.query:
MATCH (l:Library)-->(sir:SyntaxInstanceRoot)-[:LATEST]->(siv:SyntaxInstanceValue), (sir)<--(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot) 
OPTIONAL MATCH (str)-[r1:USES_PARAMETER]->(tp:TemplateParameter)
OPTIONAL MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r2]->(sv:StudyValue)-[r3]->(selc:StudySelection)-[r4]->(siv)
OPTIONAL MATCH (siv)-[:USES_VALUE]->(tptr:TemplateParameterTermRoot)-[:LATEST]->(tptv:TemplateParameterTermValue) 
OPTIONAL MATCH (sir)<--(:SyntaxTemplateRoot)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(:CTTermRoot)-->(ar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(av:CTTermAttributesValue)
CALL {
    WITH sv, sr
    MATCH (sr)-[r:HAS_VERSION]->(sv)
    RETURN r
    ORDER BY r.start_date DESC
    LIMIT 1
}
WITH tptv, tp, l, siv, sir, str, av, COLLECT(DISTINCT sv.study_id_prefix + "-" + sv.study_number + " : " + r.status) as StudyDetails
WHERE (tp.name in $neodash_templateparameter_name or $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null ) and
      (tptv.name in $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name or $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null)
RETURN
    l.name as Library,
    str.sequence_id as SequenceNumber,
    [item IN [s IN labels(siv) | apoc.text.replace(s, 'Value$', '')] WHERE NOT item IN ["SyntaxInstance", "SyntaxTemplate", "SyntaxIndexingInstance", "SyntaxPreInstance"]] as Type,
    av.preferred_term as SubType,
    //siv.name as FormattedText,
    siv.name_plain as `Template Instantiation`,
    SIZE(StudyDetails) as StudyCount,
    StudyDetails,
    tp.name as TemplateParameter
ORDER BY str.sequence_id, siv.name_plain

reports.title: Selected Template Parameter and/or Value
reports.query:
Return CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparameter_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparameter_name END as `Selected Parameters`,
CASE WHEN $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name[0] is null THEN [] ELSE $neodash_templateparametertermvalue_name END as `Selected Values`

reports.title: Template Instantiations by Type and Library
reports.query:
MATCH (l:Library)-->(sir:SyntaxInstanceRoot)-[:LATEST]->(siv:SyntaxInstanceValue), (sir)<--(str:SyntaxTemplateRoot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (siv)-[:USES_VALUE]->(tptr:TemplateParameterTermRoot)-[:LATEST]->(tptv:TemplateParameterTermValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (sir)<--(:SyntaxTemplateRoot)-[:HAS_TYPE]->(tp:CTTermRoot)-->(ar:CTTermAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(av:CTTermAttributesValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (siv)<--(:StudySelection)<--(sv:StudyValue)<-[]-(sr:StudyRoot)
CALL {
    WITH sv, sr
    MATCH (sr)-[r:HAS_VERSION]->(sv)
    RETURN r
    ORDER BY r.start_date DESC
    LIMIT 1
}
WITH l, siv, sir, str, av, COLLECT(DISTINCT sv.study_id_prefix + "-" + sv.study_number + " : " + r.status) as StudyDetails
 
RETURN DISTINCT
    l.name as Library,
    SUM(SIZE(StudyDetails)) as Value,
    [item IN [s IN labels(siv) | apoc.text.replace(s, 'Value$', '')] WHERE NOT item IN ["SyntaxInstance", "SyntaxTemplate", "SyntaxIndexingInstance", "SyntaxPreInstance"]] as TemplateType
    //av.preferred_term as SubType,
